column76: ISvaraH||1.1.28.1.1||1.1.28:SafKo lakRmIpaweH pAFcajanyaScakraM suxarSanam. kOmoxakI gaxA Kadgo nanxakaH kOswuBo maNiH. cApaH SArfgaMmurAreswu SrIvawso lAFCanaM smqwam. aSvASca SEvyasugrIvameGapuRpabalAhakAH. sAraWirxAruko manwrI hyuxXavaScAnujo gaxaH..
